data.title: Pizza Nights — Sprouting Acres Organic Farm & Events
data.meta_description: Enjoy live music, games, and delicious hand-tossed, wood-fired pizza right here on our family farm. First and third Sundays, May thru October!
data.text:
Sprouting Acres is proud to offer hand-tossed, wood-fired pizza, other house-made food items, cold bevvies, and live music out on the farm on the first and third Sundays (only) from 2:30-8:00 pm, seasonally from May through October.

It’s delightfully clear to us that Cambridge’s secret is out, and our pizza nights have become a wildly popular community event. Pro-tip for our newcomers: Pre-planning will best set you up for a your most enjoyable experience! Read on:

ONLINE PRE-ORDERING goes live one week in advance of the next pizza night – watch for the email notification (or check our website) the prior Sunday morning/early afternoon. We normally sell out of our pre-order availability within 12-24 hours, often less! Best way to get notified? Subscribe to our farm email list (scroll to the very bottom of this page, fill out the yellow box!)

WALK-IN ORDERS: We highly recommend placing your order in advance, BUT we do save some availability for walk-in orders. However, please know that walk in orders are limited and normally sell out on the earlier side of the day. So, if you are hoping for a walk-in pizza order, try to come closer to 3:00p than 7:00p, if you catch our drift! :)

Our busiest time is between 4:00-6:30 pm, so expect longer wait times (30-60 minutes) if you walk-in without a pre-order during that time period.

If you miss both the online pre-order window and our walk-in pizzas are sold out by the time you get here, we do offer a limited variety of other food items to choose from, such as sandwiches, salads, and treats.

You can make a day/night of it with us, enjoy our land, and play and dine on the farm; OR you can get your order for takeout!

Please use our online ordering system!

Online ordering opens the Sunday morning/early afternoon prior to the next pizza night. If you are subscribed to our farm email list, you will get an email as soon as the pre-ordering is live.

Online orders close at 8:00 pm the night before pizza Sunday – BUT normally all pre-order spots are reserved well before then, in which case the ordering window closes early.

This doesn't mean we are completely sold out… it does mean that the remainder of our spots are for (limited) walk-in orders only on the day of event.

Our busiest time is between 4:00-6:30 pm, so expect longer wait times (30-60 minutes) if you walk-in without a pre-order during that time period.

Note that we do NOT accept call-in orders.

If you pre-ordered online, your food will be ready around the time you reserved. Please pay attention to the time, so you can pick it up promptly, fresh and hot out of the oven! If you have been waiting more than 15 minutes past your pre-order time, please come check in with a staff member.

If you placed a walk-in order, your wait time will vary. Your order will be added to the first available hour time slot; the cashier can tell you which hour time slot your order will be added to. (Example: if you order at 5pm and get the 6pm time slot, you will get your pizza between 6-7pm.) If you have been waiting past your hour time slot, please come check in with a staff member.
